definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
HMS Amethyst, Royal Navy corvette involved in a 1949 gunfight with the PLA on the Changjiang

sentences.english: Truth? A pebble of quartz? For once, then, something.
sentences.chinese: 真相？一塊石英？只一次，便成永遠。

sentences.english: In this paper the principles, Structure and processing methods of quartz capsule are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了石英膜盒的工作原理，結構和製造工藝。

sentences.english: The sensor consists of two sets of quartz wedges which are respectively right-handed and left-handed with equal angle.
sentences.chinese: 傳感元件爲兩套楔角相同的左旋和右旋石英光楔。

sentences.english: The synthesis of carbon nanotubes was conducted in a quartz tube furnace.
sentences.chinese: 碳納米管的合成是在石英管式爐中完成。

sentences.english: Mother's old-fashioned quartz watch was inherited from my grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 老式石英錶是姥姥留給她的。

sentences.english: Shancheng gold ore deposit is a fault controlled quartz-vein type gold ore deposit in Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 山城金礦爲石英脈型金礦，受斷裂構造控制。

sentences.english: The radiation response of 375 ℃ thermoluminescence(TL) peak can be changed.
sentences.chinese: 石英375℃熱釋光峯存在靈敏度的變化。

sentences.english: These systems utilize lamps which are basically sealed quartz tubes containing the fill material and argon gas.
sentences.chinese: 這些系統主要是利用填充物質和氬氣的封口石英管。

sentences.english: The main mineralized types are quartz vein type and alteration pattern with fracture zone.
sentences.chinese: 主要礦化類型有石英脈型和破碎帶蝕變巖型。

sentences.english: Your quartz clocks are quite salable on our market.
sentences.chinese: 你們的石英鐘在市場上賣得不錯。

sentences.english: Quartz Mountain Residence, Paradise Valley, Arizona.
sentences.chinese: 亞力桑那州，天堂谷，石英山居。

sentences.english: To do a good job in artificial quartz plate, the following four points is the key.
sentences.chinese: 要想做好人造石英石板材，以下四點是關鍵。

sentences.english: Batteries power more than 95 percent of quartz watches.
sentences.chinese: 以上石英錶的能量來源是電池。

sentences.english: The quartz sandstone appears in the upper member of Yangzhuang Formation as thin-bedded strata with double peaks of grain size distribution.
sentences.chinese: 石英砂岩呈薄層出現在楊莊組上部，具雙衆數結構。

sentences.english: Inorganic filler, such as quartz powder, was filled.
sentences.chinese: 填加無機耐熱填料石英粉。

sentences.english: Spa-Like Bathrooms W/Quartz Counters & Double Sinks.
sentences.chinese: 溫泉般的浴室與石英計數器和雙水槽。

definition: stone beam/horizontal slab of stone/feldspar or felspar (geology)
orthoclase KAlSi3O8 (rock-forming mineral, type of feldspar)
